titleStmt.title: Four sermons preached in Oxford by John Price.
titleStmt.author: Price, John, Master of arts.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
(From t.p.) I. The Christians Excellency, upon Mat. 5,47--II. Truth begets enmity, upon Gal. 4,16--III. A nations happinesse in a good King, Eccles. 10,17--IV. The praise of charity, upon Heb. 13,16.
